jediranger:Amplifier.NAME: Amplifier
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yjediranger:Empower a card, #yjediranger:Empower it by #b%d more.

jediranger:RegularQuiver.NAME: Regular Quiver
jediranger:RegularQuiver.FLAVOR: It actually tastes a bit salty and metallic. Why did you lick a quiver again?
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time each combat a card is generated, gain #b%d #yStrength.

jediranger:SharpFang.NAME: Sharp Fang
jediranger:SharpFang.FLAVOR: It's actually just a glorified drinking straw.

jediranger:GrindingWheel.NAME: Grinding Wheel
jediranger:GrindingWheel.FLAVOR: Too old and used up for your entire weapon, but has just enough power to sharpen the tip.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yjediranger:Empower a card in hand by its combined damage and #yBlock.

jediranger:CursedBlood.NAME: Cursed Blood
jediranger:CursedBlood.FLAVOR: You suddenly feel a disturbing lack of crimson liquid in your body.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first card created each combat becomes a #yWound instead.
